summary: This module adds a parameterized single‑qubit phase rotation gate and its controlled variants to the circuit library. The gates are diagonal, apply a phase e^{iλ} to the target qubit (or only when the control is |1⟩ for the controlled version), and can be implemented virtually as a frame change without physical error or duration.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to construct quantum circuits that require precise phase adjustments, offering both standalone and controlled phase operations that integrate seamlessly with the broader quantum computing framework.
